name: Desglose de Oportunidades
query:
SELECT NAME AS 'ID:Link/Opportunity:150', 
		OWNER AS 'Creado por::150', 
		party_name AS 'Oportunidad Para::150', 
	    opportunity_type AS 'Tipo de Oportunidad::150',
		contact_by AS 'Siguente Contacto::150', 
		DATE(creation) AS 'Fecha:Date:150', 
		STATUS AS 'Estado::150', 
		currency AS 'Moneda::80',
		opportunity_amount AS 'Monto:Currency:150'
FROM  `tabOpportunity`
where creation >= %(from_date)s and creation <= %(to_date)s
ORDER BY creation desc
